tool_description: This Amazon Scraping API will help you scrape through Amazon's products, prices, reviews, sales ranks and display it in JSON format (in seconds)!
name: Scrapazon
title: Scrapazon

api_list.name: Get Amazon Product Details
api_list.description: Here it gets the product details previously mentioned (price, sales rank, reviews, etc.).
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://scrapazon.p.rapidapi.com/products/B09X8KFRB4"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "scrapazon.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://scrapazon.p.rapidapi.com/products/{productid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "scrapazon.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
